nodes.bodyText: Is this due to potentially subscribing to the same topic for a later slot due to another aggregation duty?
Nvm, yeah it seems pretty clear.

Yes. I think it's most likely to happen if we happen when one of the validators we run is aggregator for a committee in this epoch and another one (or the same one) is aggregator for that same committee next epoch.  You'd want to stay subscribed until the second one is reached.
